entry.title: MyTheTwentySeventhBlog
entry.content: Quotations What you are doing is far more useful than what you said Just do it. 语录12你做的远比你说的有用。去做就对了。

entry.title: MyTheTwentySixthBlog
entry.content: Quotations Be good at doing things, don’t get too much. Go and insist on doing one thing. 语录12做事要精益求精，不要得过且过。坚持去做一件事情。

entry.title: MyTheTwentyFifthBlog
entry.content: Quotations Don’t start your day with broken pieces of the past.Yesterday ended last night.Today is brend new day and it’s yours. Today is today. 语录12不要以破碎的过去开始你的一天，昨天在做完就已经结束了，今天是崭新的一天，是属于你的一天。今日事今日毕。

entry.title: MyTheTwentyFourthBlog
entry.content: Quotations Stick to one thing. Add entropy to do things, then let things go in the right direction. 语录12坚持去做一件事。加熵去做事情，然后让事情往好的方向发展。

entry.title: MyTheTwentyThreeBlog
entry.content: Quotations Solve your procrastination. Today is today 语录12解决你的拖延症。今日事今日毕。

entry.title: MyTheTwentySecondBlog
entry.content: Quotations If you define the problem correctly you almost hava the solution. To live is the rarest thing inthe world.Most people exist, that ia all. 语录12如果你正确地正义了这个问题，你就很快找到答案了。世界上最宝贵的是生活，而绝大数人只是为了生存，仅此而已。

entry.title: MyTheTwentyFirstBlog
entry.content: quotation Don’t focus on the past again, look to the future. Don’t complain, To do it. 语录12不要再关注过去，展望未来。别再抱怨了，去做它。

entry.title: MyTwentythBlog
entry.content: Mood Just calm down, don’t be too impatient, everything will be better. Long-lost insomnia feels clearer, and everything will get better soon. 心境12静下心来，不要太急躁，一切都会更好。久违的失眠感觉让自己变得更加清晰，慢慢来一切都会好起来。

entry.title: MyNineteenthBlog
entry.content: Quotations Stick to yourself. Everything will be better. 语录12坚持做你自己一切会更好

entry.title: MyEighteenthBlog
entry.content: Quotations Miracle sometimes occurs, but one has to work terribly hard for them. Change is the only constant in life One’s ability to adapt to those changes will determine your success in life. 语录12奇迹有时会发生，但是必须为他们努力工作。变化是生命中唯一的变化一个人适应这些变化的能力将决定你的人生成就。

entry.title: MySeventeenthBlog
entry.content: life Only poverty can be obtained without paying. Appreciate first, then promote, then rise straight. 生活12唯有贫困可以不劳而获先升值，再升职，后升直

entry.title: MySixteenthBlog
entry.content: life Everyone has the ability of everyone. Persevere will be good. 生活12每个人都有每个人的想法。坚持会好的。

entry.title: MyFifteenthBlog
entry.content: Early Go to bed early and get up early. Everyone has a choice for everyone. 早起12早睡早起每个人都有每个人的选择

entry.title: MyFourteenthBlog
entry.content: life Things hava a way of working out when you least expect it. Never give it up. Suitable age to do the right thing. 生活12事情总是在你最不抱期望的时候得到解决，所以永远不要放弃。适合的年纪做适合的事情

entry.title: MyThirteenthBlog
entry.content: 迷茫 When you focus on problems, you get more problems.When you focus on possibilities, you hava more opportunites. We are made to persist. This is how we find out who we are. confused12当你专注于问题时，你会遇到更多的问题。当你关注可能性时，你就会有更多的机会。我们生来就是为了坚持，这样我们才能明白自己是谁。

entry.title: MyTwelfthBlog
entry.content: new mouth New month, new beginning. Real life begins with finishing. 新的一个月12新的一个月新的开始。真正的生活从整理开始。

entry.title: MyEleventhBlog
entry.content: Do not give up Even miracles take a litter time. Always know what you want. 别放弃12就算是奇迹也要花点时间才能发生的。永远知道自己想要什么。

entry.title: MyTenthBlog
entry.content: Daily Always empty your mind. Today will be cruel, tomorrow will be more cruel, the day after tomorrow will be better. Don’t let yourself feel that you are working hard. 日常123永远把自己的心态放空。今天会很残酷，明天会更残酷，后天会更美好。不要让自己觉得自己很努力。

entry.title: MyNinthBlog
entry.content: endless good news Life is always endless good news. Please keep your mind steady 惊喜不断12生活总是无穷无尽的好消息请让心态保持稳重

entry.title: MyEighthBlog
entry.content: I am back Don’t worry about something that is not necessary anymore. Do what you like 我回来了12不要担心不再需要的东西。你喜欢什么。

entry.title: MySeventhBlog
entry.content: happy a day In the era of micromedia, you must learn how to spread yourself out. There are only two ways to change your life in the future, one is to learn technology and the other is to buy lottery tickets. The algorithm portrays you, is the real you. Everyone knows what they want. Technology may also be the same, the enormous energy contained in the rapid development will eventually bring human society to an unpredictable state of vulnerability. If you do not exert external influence, things will always develop toward a more chaotic state. Why is “the world is not strong, and the clouds are easy to loosen the glass?” It is because energy maintains a beautiful state that requires energy. If there is no energy input, the good state will end. As long as you want to learn, as long as you are progressing, you can really be better tomorrow. In the long run, politics and the economy are not very important, and the trend is not affected. What really plays a decisive role is technology. I feel particularly sad when I think that my life span is only a few decades. Not because I am afraid of death, but because I will not have the opportunity to see new and interesting new technologies in the next millennium. 快乐的一天12345678910111213141516171819# 微媒体的时代，你必须学会如何把自己传播出去。# 未来只有两种途径可以改变人生，一种是学习技术，另一种是购买彩票。# 算法刻画的你，才是真正的你。# 每个人知道自己想要什么。# 技术可能也是如此，高速发展所蕴含的巨大能量，最终将把人类社会带到难以预测的脆弱状态。# 如果不施加外力影响，事物永远向着更混乱的状态发展。# 为什么“世间好物不坚牢，彩云易散琉璃脆”？就是因为事物维持美好的状态是需要能量的，如果没有能量输入，美好的状态就会结束。# 只要你要学习时，只要你在进步时，才能真正地明天会更好。# 长期来看，政治和经济都不太重要，影响不了趋势，真正起决定性作用的是技术。# 一想到我的寿命只有几十年，我就感到特别难过。倒不是因为我害怕死亡，而是因为我将没有机会看到，未来一千年中各种新奇有趣的新技术。
